name: Lava Chimp
description: A mischievous primate dwelling in the volcanic forges of hell, its fur singed by constant exposure to molten rock.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Deals 555 + 80% physical damage to the target with a 55% chance to jump to another target, dealing the same damage. Can chain infinitely.

abilities.name: Burning Spear Stab
abilities.description: The chimp jumps onto the target with a burning spear, dealing 200% Physical Damage, stunning them for 3 turns, and nullifying their armor.

passive.name: Volcanic Leap
passive.description: When Lava Chimp dodges an attack, it immediately leaps onto a random enemy, dealing 155% physical damage with spectacular volcanic effects.
